title: the consent of the Minister for Justice, hereby makes the following regulations:
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Private Security (Identity Badge)
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Private Security (Identity Badge) 

Regulations 2024.

title: the consent of the Minister for Justice, hereby makes the following regulations:
heading: 2. These Regulations come into effect on 1st November 2024.
text_raw: 2. These Regulations come into effect on 1st November 2024.

title: the consent of the Minister for Justice, hereby makes the following regulations:
heading: In these Regulations—
text_norm: 3 regulations-- act mean private security service act 2004 door supervisor licence meaning private security (licensing qualifications) regulation 2022 identity card meaning identity card issued private security service act 2004 protected form transport (cash-in-transit) licence meaning licence issued private security service act 2004 security guard (guarding) licence meaning private security (licensing qualifications) regulation 2022 security guard temporary licence meaning private security (security guard temporary licence) regulation 2022

title: the consent of the Minister for Justice, hereby makes the following regulations:
heading: 4. The categories of licensees specified in Schedule 1 are prescribed as
text_raw:

title: the consent of the Minister for Justice, hereby makes the following regulations:
heading: 5. (1) The identity badge shall take the form of an identity card issued by the
text_raw:
5. (1) The identity badge shall take the form of an identity card issued by the 
Private Security Authority as prescribed by Schedule 4 of S.I. No. 147 of 2012. 

(2) The form, content and size of the identity card is prescribed as the form, 
content and size of an identity badge to be worn by the categories of persons 
prescribed by Regulation 4.
text_norm: 5 (1) identity badge shall take form identity card issued private security authority prescribed schedule 4 s.i no 147 2012 (2) form content size identity card prescribed form content size identity badge worn category person prescribed regulation 4

title: the consent of the Minister for Justice, hereby makes the following regulations:
heading: 6. The Private Security (Identity Badge) Regulations 2009 (S.I. No.
text_raw:
6. The Private Security (Identity Badge) Regulations 2009 (S.I. No. 

332/2009) are revoked. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st November, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [588] 3 

Categories of licensees prescribed for the purposes of section 30 of the Act

the consent of the Minister for Justice, hereby makes the following regulations:
heading: Persons holding a door supervisor licence.
text_raw:
3. 

Persons holding a door supervisor licence. 

Persons holding a protected forms of transport (cash-in-transit) licence. 

Persons holding a security guard (guarding) licence other than while 
such service is being provided and as respects such service it is 
necessary for the effective provision of the service concerned that 
members of the public should not be aware that the person is providing 
such service.

title: the consent of the Minister for Justice, hereby makes the following regulations:
heading: Persons holding a security guard temporary licence.
text_raw:
4. 

Persons holding a security guard temporary licence. 

The Minister for Justice consents to the making of the foregoing Regulations. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

17 October, 2024. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Private Security 
Authority, 

23 October 2024. 

JILLIAN VAN TURNHOUT, 

Chairperson. 

JOHN PHELAN, 

Chief Executive.
